DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN NARRATIVE : The study examine relative efficacy pharmacologic , cognitive behavioral , conjoint pharmacological/behavioral intervention chronic sleep-onset insomnia . Sixty-three medication-free , chronic sleep-onset insomniac complete evaluation , baseline sleep diary , daytime function mood inventory home-based objective sleep assessment ( OSA ) . Subjects randomized one four intervention : 1 ) six week Zolpidem intervention ( D drug ) ; 2 ) six week multifactor behavioral intervention ( B behavioral ) ; 3 ) six week conjoint Zolpidem multifactor behavioral intervention ( DB ) ; 4 ) placebo medication intervention ( P placebo ) . The main outcome measure sleep-onset latency measure sleep diary ; secondary measure include sleep diary measure sleep efficiency total sleep time , objective measure sleep variable ( Nightcap sleep monitor recorder ) , measure daytime functioning . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
